comment: Best professor so far. I was ready to drop my program after some truly pathetic instructors .Glad I stuck with it & found Dr. Rich! Great teacher with a great personality to match his excellent teaching style. follow the material, attend his lectures, and keep current with assignments, then you won't have to stress because he wants you to succeed.

I've had Professor Richard throughout my MSIT pursuit. He's an amazing professor, highly recommend. Coursework leans on the light side if you manage your time wisely. Course projects weren't too stressful and tied in to the coursework done during the semester. Weekly meetings were optional, but he's so nice that I always feel bad for missing them.

Dr. Rich is one of my favorite professors! This was my second class with him and I signed up for a third. His classes mimic that of a real world environment in terms of deliverables and I feel it prepares you for a career in the corporate world. The class consists of assignments and a group project. Take him!!
Excellent professor. This was a tough class because of the content load and required reading and assignments but well worth the time and effort.

I really like Professor Rich and would highly recommend his classes.  He does require a very demanding amount of work, but it is fun and he is very helpful.. Usually you will work in a team on the most demanding project (I have had 4 classes with Dr. Rich.  Excellent professor.

Great teacher. I have done three courses with him, would take more if available. His teaching methods are very effective and interesting.Encourages discussions and arguments in class. Everyone gets a chance to express their views.
Interesting and engaging teching methods. We look forward to his classes

This was the research methods class.  While there was a fair bit of work, none of it was too overwhelming.  He had a lot of examples of industry to give and was usually always helpful and lively.  He seemed very excited about the subject matter.
Cool professor. We did have test, but you will need to read entire book to pass the class, do the homework, & the case study.
He was a very easy teacher.  Only grades were two papers the midterm and the weekly assignments.  I went to class 4 times and still got a good grade.  I would recommend him for e-commerce class.
Great professor .Very clear on requirements.lot of research needed but very helpful unlike exams and open to various ubjects and topics.
